did.unittitle: U.S. Department of Labor Wage and Hour and Public Contracts Division Special Industry Committee #31 Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: U.S. Department of Labor U.S. Department of Labor. Wage and Hour Division

did.abstract: Orders, exhibits, and reports of Special Industry Committee 31.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The U.S. Secretary of Labor appointed Industry Committee #31 to consider the question of minimuim wage rates for the Puerto Rican industries included in Administrative Order #483 issued on May 22, 1957 and hearings were begun on July 8, 1957.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
